Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI gives much quicker feedback and can be used before submission - while teachers sometimes don’t give individual feedback at all

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I never do elective 1 on 1 feedback with my teacher because it makes me anxious (it’s something I need to work on)but I would fully trust my teachers words unlike ai which I take everything it says as a suggestion or half-truth
